title: Looking for ID or similar fonts to these sketched characters
content:
in an early design class, i was given the letters Q and a to design with. please help me identify the typeface or one similar to it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808141334im_/http:/typophile.com/files/qa.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Sans used intensively on Yahoo! - Gotham {Tiff}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808141334/http:/typophile.com/node/19387 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Hera logo serif face - Rotis Serif {Dav} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808141334/http:/typophile.com/node/19381 "Go to next forum topic")
author: hifi481

comments.content: The lc “a” makes me think of [ITC Bookman](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808141334/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.125834.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=96&sampleText=a&sampleSize=144), the uc “Q” could be something designed by Goudy.
